mapper.delete:
delete from stock_weiwai where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select s.sale_number,s.member_number,m.name,m.phone_1,sa.eye_type,s.settle_date,sa.sale_name from settlement s left join member m on s.member_number=m.card_number left join store_sales sa on s.sale_number=sa.sale_number

SELECT w.*, s.right_fartj, s.left_fartj, s.right_neartj, s.left_neartj, j.view_good_name as goodsName, jp.view_good_name as goodsName2 FROM stock_weiwai w JOIN stock_weiwaishuju s ON w.sale_number = s.number JOIN aa_jpdz j ON s.right_num=j.produc_num JOIN aa_jpdz jp ON s.left_num=jp.produc_num where w.danju_number = #{value}

select w.*,s.right_fartj,s.left_fartj,s.right_neartj,s.left_neartj from stock_weiwai w join stock_weiwaishuju s on w.sale_number =s.number from stock_weiwai w join stock_weiwaishuju s on w.sale_number =s.number JOIN aa_yxdz y ON s.right_num=y.produc_num JOIN aa_yxdz yx ON s.left_num=yx.produc_num where w.danju_number = #{value}
